To all Linux 64-bit users:

The screenshot viewer seems to crash because of the "libpng" bug. That can be fixed by patching the executable (cd into the folder first):

cp KSP.x86\_64 KSP.x86\_64.bak && echo "7cebc7: 00" | xxd -r - KSP.x86\_64 && echo "7cebcc: 00" | xxd -r - KSP.x86\_64

This fix still works, because KSP.x86_64 is exactly the same for version 0.22.

When I landed to the moon and sync with the server, my deployed rover duplicated as well.

It seems like everything that is not attached to your craft will duplicate when you sync.

Tried to dock to a station yesterday, there were two bugs going on: my craft duplicated somehow (before docking), and as i approach the station it jumped away from me a few times for about hundred meters each time :/

When I landed to the moon and sync with the server, my deployed rover duplicated as well.

It seems like everything that is not attached to your craft will duplicate when you sync.

At least you are able to get close enough to your space station!!! I was trying to intercept my friend's space station last night. However, I get soo lag when Im 2km away from it

I keep getting disconnected because I am "running too slowly" compared to other players. What does this mean? My framerate? My connection speed? My MET clock is running too slowly?

Yeah. Had the same issue. Just create another save, jump into it and put something small on the launch pad. Then do physwarp. Then go back to the main menu and you should be fine when playing around on the server.

Unfortunetally you'll have to do that everytime you launch KSP.

I don't understand your point. Create another save - not delete KMP one. It will connect you as long as you have KMP save. I did what I described, because I had the same bug as you have. You may also want to turn your graphics settings down a bit, turn off terrain scatter, disable debris etc. It's something about the game that when you do phys warp then lagsbane kinda speeds it up.
I hate the new chat, it gets in the way of all the parts when building.

I don't understand your point. Create another save - not delete KMP one. It will connect you as long as you have KMP save. I did what I described, because I had the same bug as you have. You may also want to turn your graphics settings down a bit, turn off terrain scatter, disable debris etc. It's something about the game that when you do phys warp then lagsbane kinda speeds it up.

The entire point of this mod is that you can interact with other players in real time - EVA together, dock with each other etc.... you can't do any of that if I'm not synced with the other player. You solution prevents getting kicked... but it also prevents me from interacting with other players. It basically means I'm just playing single player with an added chat room. I want to interact with other people, not just see them on the map.

Thanks for the idea though, but its not what I'm after, I want multiplayer.

The entire point of this mod is that you can interact with other players in real time - EVA together, dock with each other etc.... you can't do any of that if I'm not synced with the other player. You solution prevents getting kicked... but it also prevents me from interacting with other players. It basically means I'm just playing single player with an added chat room. I want to interact with other people, not just see them on the map.

Thanks for the idea though, but its not what I'm after, I want multiplayer.

How does his solution prevent you from interacting with players? It's just a small procedure you have to do, then you go back and join the server and continue as usual. Unless I am mistaken..
new stability is good, still unable to rover race due to jitteryness but i imagine you guys are working your asses off on this atm, excellent work so far keep it up

How does his solution prevent you from interacting with players? It's just a small procedure you have to do, then you go back and join the server and continue as usual. Unless I am mistaken..

You need to be in the same "timezone" as the other player. Otherwise all you are seeing is their ship in either a past position or a predicted future position. If they, for instance, turn their spacecraft with rcs, or jump a kerbal in the air you will not see it unless you are synced to their time zone.

when I try to use a mod part KMP says that it is prohibited, is there a file I need to tweak or a patch.

now how will is have aircraft carrier wars with my friends

when I try to use a mod part KMP says that it is prohibited, is there a file I need to tweak or a patch.

now how will is have aircraft carrier wars with my friends

You, and the server itself, need to have the part you want to use in the KMPPartList.txt file. There is instructions in the readme file for the server on how it do it. If the server doesn't have it enabled you are out of luck though,
Thumbs up!

Guys, amazing work, seriously.

Been testing all the versions, I constantly see advances.

Keep it up! Please let us know when you are actually expecting feedback in the main post, so that I can help when it's actually needed

I'll be looking at the code the next few days, to see if I can help. Experienced C# developer myself

Wow, awesome work! Been waiting a long time for a multiplayer, I always wondered how time acceleration would affect multiplayer games, but this is a nice work around!

Also, for those who aren't command promt savvy that want to run a server, or just to lazy, it's REALLY easy to make a bat file to start the server.

Make a text file in your KMP server root directory (Where KMPserver.exe is), put this in it,

cd /d "G:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KMP" (Change to your KMP server directory)

start KMPServer.exe

(those are \ not a |)

save it as wordsgohere.bat, then run the bat AS AN ADMINISTRATOR every time you want to start the server. Who needs command prompt!

Hello, thanks for making such an awesome mod!

I was wondering if anyone else was having the same problems me and my friend were. We decided to download a bunch of mods and for some reason the parts list just doesn't want to work with us. For example we can only load the Kethane drills and the 1.25 M drives (or usually just anything 1.25 M)from the interstellar mod. Is there any idea on how to fix this (we noticed that the parts names would sometimes have their _ replaced with a period but we managed to fix all these but it still doesn't work. Any ideas?
